cause.description:
Supplying low-income housing units with energy-saving CFL bulbs, both helping families to save on utility costs and fighting global warming.
Spreading awareness of the benefits of CFL bulbs.
Encouraging all New Yorkers to switch to CFL bulbs in their homes.
www.relightNY.com
1. If all you had to do was change a light bulb to fight global warming, would you?
cause.mission: RelightNY's mission is to educate and inspire people to take action and live in ways that protect the earth's environment for current and future generations.
cause.name: RelightNY
